functions.name: window-width
functions.description: Get the size of the window's width.

functions.name: window-height
functions.description: Get the size of the window's height.

functions.name: window-percent-width
functions.description: Get a value relative to the size of the window's width. Float's map 0% - 100% with 0.0 - 1.0, while integer's use 0 - 100.

functions.name: window-percent-height
functions.description: Get a value relative to the size of the window's height. Float's map 0% - 100% with 0.0 - 1.0, while integer's use 0 - 100.
